ygData.subject: Re: XP question
ygData.msgSnippet: HUMAN players don t get a bonus, per say, but they just don t get a exp hit for their class.  A paladin human, for instance, would lose 20% of their
ygData.messageBody:
HUMAN players don't get a bonus, per say, but they just don't get a exp hit
for their class. A paladin human, for instance, would lose 20% of their
experience, whereas a dwarf human loses (I think) 40%. A human warrior or
rogue, however has NO loss whatsoever.

-----Original Message-----
From: Tony B <tonyb72@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, May 27, 1999 9:40 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] XP question


>From: "Tony B" <tonyb72@...>
>
>there is no penalty, but humans get an xp bonus. i assume that is *human*
>and not erudin or barbarian; please correct me if im wrong.
>
>belphenor
>
>

>>
>>can anyone confirm
